main_definition: A country located in North America, known for its rich cultural history and diverse landscapes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The capital city of Mexico, often considered a hub of political power and modern development.
meanings_and_examples.example: Mexico City is one of the largest cities in the world.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A Mexican person or something related to the culture or people of Mexico.
meanings_and_examples.example: His family has strong ties with their Mexican heritage.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to a popular saying, 'Mexico's got it all,' used metaphorically to imply that something is very attractive or appealing.
meanings_and_examples.example: The beach resort in Mexico was truly one-of-a-kind and had everything anyone could ask for.

meanings_and_examples.definition: 'Mexico' can also refer to a specific type of corn, commonly known as 'maseca'.
meanings_and_examples.example: I bought some Mexican maize (or maseca) flour at the grocery store today.
